meanings.meaning_en_US: Absolutely necessary; essential.

examples.sentence: Water is [indispensable] for human survival.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 水對人類的生存是不可或缺的

examples.sentence: Honesty is an [indispensable] quality in a leader.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 誠實是領導者不可或缺的素質

examples.sentence: These tools are [indispensable] for the job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些工具對工作是必需的

meanings.meaning_en_US: Referring to more than one person or thing.

examples.sentence: The [plural] form of the word indicates more than one.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個詞的複數形式表示多於一個

examples.sentence: English has many [plural] nouns.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 英文有很多複數名詞

examples.sentence: Understanding [plural] concepts is important.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 理解複數概念是很重要的

meanings.meaning_en_US: To oversee a person or activity to ensure proper performance.

examples.sentence: The manager will [supervise] the new employees during training.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 經理將在培訓期間監督新員工。

examples.sentence: Teachers often [supervise] students during tests.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教師通常在考試期間監督學生。

examples.sentence: She was hired to [supervise] the project's progress.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她被雇來監督項目的進展。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A hostile or argumentative meeting between two parties.

examples.sentence: The [confrontation] between the two leaders escalated quickly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 兩位領袖之間的對抗迅速升級。

examples.sentence: A [confrontation] can sometimes be necessary for resolution.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 對抗有時對於解決問題是必要的。

examples.sentence: Avoid a [confrontation] unless absolutely necessary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 除非絕對必要，否則避免對抗。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Able to express thoughts and feelings clearly and effectively.
meanings.meaning_zh_TW: 表達清晰的，口齒伶俐的

examples.sentence: She is an [articulate] speaker who can engage any audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位能夠吸引任何觀眾的口齒伶俐的演講者。

examples.sentence: His [articulate] writing style makes complex ideas easy to understand.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他清晰的寫作風格使複雜的想法變得易於理解。

examples.sentence: Being [articulate] is a valuable skill in both personal and professional life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 表達清晰在個人和職業生涯中都是一項寶貴的技能。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who travels some distance to work on a regular basis.

examples.sentence: The city has a large number of [commuters] every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座城市每天早上有很多通勤者

examples.sentence: He is a daily [commuter] by bus.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是每天搭公車的通勤者

examples.sentence: The [commuter] train offers several convenient routes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 通勤火車提供幾條便利的路線

meanings.meaning_en_US: To travel some distance between one's home and place of work on a regular basis.

examples.sentence: Many people [commute] to work by train.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人搭火車通勤上班

examples.sentence: I [commute] almost two hours each day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我每天通勤幾乎要花兩個小時

examples.sentence: She enjoys reading while she [commutes].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在通勤時閱讀

meanings.meaning_en_US: Showing a quick and inventive verbal humor.

examples.sentence: Her [witty] remarks always make everyone laugh.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她機智的評論總是讓大家笑。

examples.sentence: A [witty] response can lighten the mood.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 機智的回答可以緩解氣氛。

examples.sentence: He has a [witty] sense of humor that captivates his audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有一種機智的幽默感，吸引了他的觀眾。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Feeling or showing sympathy and concern for others.

examples.sentence: She is a very [compassionate] person who helps others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一個非常富有同情心的人，幫助他人。

examples.sentence: His [compassionate] actions made a big difference in the community.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的富有同情心的行動對社區帶來了很大的改變。

examples.sentence: Being [compassionate] is essential in healthcare.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在醫療中，擁有同情心是至關重要的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To pay back money that was borrowed.

examples.sentence: I will [repay] the loan within a year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會在一年內償還貸款

examples.sentence: They expect you to [repay] your debts now.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們希望你現在償還債務

examples.sentence: He offered to [repay] the favor in any way he could.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他主動以任何方式償還這份恩情

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process by which the body breaks down food into smaller components that can be absorbed.

examples.sentence: Good [digestion] is essential for overall health.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 良好的消化對整體健康至關重要。

examples.sentence: Certain foods can improve [digestion].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 某些食物可以改善消化。

examples.sentence: She studied the [digestion] process in her biology class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在生物課上研究了消化過程。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To fly or rise high in the air.

examples.sentence: Eagles [soar] gracefully in the sky.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老鷹優雅地在天空中翱翔。

examples.sentence: The plane began to [soar] above the clouds.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 飛機開始在雲層上空翱翔。

examples.sentence: Prices are expected to [soar] after the announcement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公佈後價格預計會上升。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To become red in the face, typically from embarrassment.

examples.sentence: She started to [blush] when he complimented her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當他稱讚她時，她開始臉紅

examples.sentence: He couldn't help but [blush] after telling the story.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 講完故事後，他忍不住臉紅

examples.sentence: Everyone could see her [blush] when she received the prize.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她得到獎品時，大家都能看到她臉紅

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat, rectangular container used for carrying documents or a laptop.

examples.sentence: He opened his [briefcase] to retrieve some important documents.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他打開公事包取出一些重要文件

examples.sentence: She always carries her [briefcase] to meetings.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她總是將公事包帶到會議上

examples.sentence: The lawyer's [briefcase] was filled with case files.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 律師的公事包裡裝滿了案件文件

meanings.meaning_en_US: Hopefulness and confidence about the future or the success of something.

examples.sentence: His [optimism] helped motivate the team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的樂觀精神激勵了團隊。

examples.sentence: She maintained her [optimism] despite the challenges.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 儘管面對挑戰，她仍保持積極的態度。

examples.sentence: Optimism can lead to better outcomes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 樂觀可以導致更好的結果。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A dish of meat and vegetables cooked slowly in liquid.

examples.sentence: She prepared a delicious [stew] for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為晚餐準備了一道美味的燉菜。

examples.sentence: We enjoyed a rich beef [stew] on a cold day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在寒冷的日子裡，我們享用了濃郁的牛肉燉菜。

examples.sentence: The [stew] was simmering on the stove all afternoon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 燉菜在爐子上煮了一整個下午。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The sound of clapping hands to show approval or admiration.

examples.sentence: The audience erupted in [applause] after the performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 表演結束後，觀眾爆發出掌聲。

examples.sentence: He received a standing ovation and loud [applause] from the crowd.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他獲得全場的起立喝彩和熱烈的掌聲。

examples.sentence: The [applause] was deafening as the winner was announced.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當宣布獲勝者時，掌聲如雷。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A distinguishing quality or characteristic, typically one belonging to a person.

examples.sentence: Generosity is a positive [trait].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 慷慨是一種正面的特徵。

examples.sentence: He has several unique [traits] that make him stand out.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有幾個獨特的特徵使他脫穎而出。

examples.sentence: Honesty is an important [trait] in a leader.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 誠實是領導者的重要特徵。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To immerse or saturate something in liquid.

examples.sentence: Please [soak] the beans overnight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請將豆子浸泡一整夜。

examples.sentence: The rain will [soak] my clothes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雨會把我的衣服弄濕。

examples.sentence: He likes to [soak] in the bath after work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡下班後泡澡。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To contaminate with a disease-causing organism.

examples.sentence: Bacteria can [infect] wounds easily.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 細菌可以輕易感染傷口

examples.sentence: The virus can [infect] many people before symptoms appear.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該病毒可以在症狀出現前感染很多人

examples.sentence: To reduce risk, wash hands to prevent [infect]ion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 為了降低風險，洗手以防止感染
